title: FS:  Several T206 HOFers - PSA 4s (plus Cicotte PSA 3)
author: Adam

posts.post_title: FS:  Several T206 HOFers - PSA 4s (plus Cicotte PSA 3)
posts.post_content:
I currently have the following for sale:

T206 Willis, with bat, Piedmont, PSA 4 - $160
T206 Bresnahan, with bat, Sweet Caporal, PSA 4 - $140
T206 Kelley, Piedmont, PSA 4 - $140
T206 Huggins, portrait, Piedmont, PSA 4 - $140
T206 Jennings, one hand, Piedmont, PSA 4 - $140
T206 Cicotte, Piedmont, PSA 3 - $115

Front and back scans of all are below.  Paypal fine with no additional surcharge.  All prices include delivery with signature confirmation.  Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like any.

Would also trade any for a graded T206 Ed Foster.

Regards,
Adam
